event.text: A sudden and unnerving ruslting stops you in your tracks.

outcome.text: Overridding instinct, you dismiss the unseen and continue onwards,
Assuming it was nothing, you push forward, only to be struck violently in the back of the head. Clutching your injury, you turn but see nothing.
Struggling to display fierce equanimity, you nervously turn to face the noise. After a tense moment looking out into the darkness, the sense of unease subsides. You causiously resume towards home.

You turn to confront the sound and see a burling, pale-faced creature standing amongst the trees. You stare at each other for a few seconds before the creature starts towards you at a frightening pace. You quickly turn and dash away as quickly as possible but appear to outrun the creature..
